text: Zalaɠa ɠula nui Yilikiya, ta Ayikame, ta Akaɓɔɔl, ta Safan, naa ʋɛɛ Azaya ʋa, ti wuzeɠeni názu, ti li GALA goo wo anzanui Ɠuluda ʋɔ bɛ. Sinigi ɠɛni ga zunui ta daaseigi ga Salume, Tikava ná-doun zunui, é ɠɛ ga Ɠaalaɠase ná-dounloin, tɔ ɠa é ɠɛni ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zei ʋɛlɛi wu zeɠeiti ma ɠundiɠii. Anzanui naa ɠɛni zeini Zeluzalɛme taazuʋɛ koi niinɛi zu. Ti ʋoluvaawoni ma.
